sentence.Network_en: Laski spent a goodly part of his lecturing life in American universities.
sentence.Network_cn: 拉斯基的教学生涯有一大部分是在美国的大学里度过的。

sentence.Network_en: The Central Intelligence Agency employed a goodly number of expert professionals in this particular field.
sentence.Network_cn: 中央情报局雇用了一大批这一领域的顶尖专业人才。

sentence.Network_en: The table spread with food made a goodly sight.
sentence.Network_cn: 桌上摆满了食物非常诱人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大学英语精读第6册 ... good for 对...有益, 能担当 goodly 优秀的, 优美的 gospel 福音, <俗>信仰, 真理.
以g开头的英语英文单词 ... goodliness 美丽,美貌,美好 goodly 漂亮的,可观的 goodnight 晚安，再见.
goodliness 美丽goodly 优秀的goodman 主人
当 good 为英文单字首码时有些和　好　有关 ... ... 2. goodliness 美丽的 3. goodly 好的 4. goodnatured 和善的.

list.abs: my time is done-these weapons may aid you . but above all , be strong at heart . the goodly Gods give you their blessing .我的时间到了——这些武器会助你一臂之力，但首先，坚定你的意志。善良的神祗祝福你。
Seismic shake broke how many children dreams goodly ., 地震震碎了多少儿童美好的梦想.
CSD still increased pseudo-random clock PRS , can have thereby fight function of frequency noise goodly .CSD还增添了伪随机时钟PRS，从而能够有精采的抗中频噪声性能。
the betterment of the world can be accomplished through pure & goodly deeds , through commendable & seemly conduct .纯洁与良好的行为，可嘉与适当的操守能够促进世界的改善。

entry.def: A goodly amount or part of something is a fairly large amount or part of it, often more than was expected.

example.ex: The Central Intelligence Agency employed a goodly number of expert professionals in this particular field...
example.tran: 中央情报局雇用了一大批这一领域的顶尖专业人才。

example.ex: Laski spent a goodly part of his lecturing life in American universities.
example.tran: 拉斯基的教学生涯有一大部分是在美国的大学里度过的。

means.word_mean: 1. large in amount or extent or degree;

auth_sentence.content: A goodly troop of young and old set forth to church.
auth_sentence.res_content: A goodly troop of young and old set forth to church.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A goodly troop of young and old set forth to church.

auth_sentence.content: Nature...grieves that so goodly a form should be a vessel of perdition.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nature...grieves that so goodly a form should be a vessel of perdition.
